entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Fermont
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:18 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -19.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wabush Airport 3:00 PM AST Friday 23 December 2022
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -19.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.4 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 81 %
Wind Chill: -27
Dewpoint: -22.2°C
Wind: N 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness this afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 32 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Temperature rising to minus 10 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning overnight. Blowing snow overnight. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 50 gusting to 80 late this evening. Temperature rising to minus 10 by morning. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind east 50 km/h gusting to 80 becoming south 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022
